<style>
:root {
  --theme-main: #00883A;

}

body {

}

.member-grid-item {

  overflow: hidden;
}

.member-grid-item:hover {

.member-socials {

<script>

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
  document.querySelectorAll('.email-link').forEach(a => {
    const href = (a.getAttribute('href') || '').trim();
    const text = (a.textContent || '').trim();
    const noEmail = !href || href.toLowerCase() === 'mailto:' || (!text || text === '' || text === '\u00A0');

    if (noEmail) {
      const icon = a.querySelector('i.fa-envelope, i.fa-solid.fa-envelope');
      if (icon) icon.remove();
      // optional: also remove empty anchor entirely if you prefer:
      // if (!a.textContent.trim()) a.remove();
    }
  });
});
</script>
